metadata.description:
Fagradalsfjall Eruption, Iceland, May 2021

2021 Edit

Edition: 1/1

Image size: 4000 x 2665 px

An indescribable sight to watch the creative forces of nature at work.

Legal: With the purchase of the NFT, the buyer/collector receives a cryptographic token that represents ownership of Dennis Polkläser / D-P Photography artwork related to the NFT, but they do not own the original photographic artwork itself. The buyer/collector receives a simple right of use / a non-exclusive license which grants the buyer the right to use the artwork associated with the NFT (unlimited in time and space, for digital / public display or share on NFT marketplaces, social media, virtual worlds/museums or similar media). All legal ownership, copyrights and exploitation rights from the authorship of the artwork remain with Dennis Polkläser / D-P Photography as the creator of the original artwork / photography.
